How many people are affected by Gitelman syndrome ?,"Gitelman syndrome affects an estimated 1 in 40,000 people worldwide.",GHR,Gitelman syndrome
What are the genetic changes related to Gitelman syndrome ?,"Gitelman syndrome is usually caused by mutations in the SLC12A3 gene. Less often, the condition results from mutations in the CLCNKB ge
